title: Lawsuit accuses Zion of rape, years of abuse
description: A woman has accused Pelicans forward Zion Williamson of rape in addition to "sexual, physical, emotional and financial" abuse during a relationship that lasted from 2018 to 2023, according to a lawsuit submitted to Los Angeles Superior Court.
author: Michael C. Wright

title: L.A.'s Betts day-to-day after stubbing toe in mishap
description: Dodgers shortstop Mookie Betts, out of Friday's lineup against the Yankees, was undergoing X-rays and is day-to-day after stubbing his left toe.

title: Are you not entertained? 'Vintage England' deliver under pressure
description: All eyes were on goalkeeper Hannah Hampton after a rocky week for the England squad - but just half an hour in, it was someone else taking the spotlight at Wembley.

title: 'A footballing architect' - how Enrique led PSG to brink of glory
description: Luis Enrique's thrilling young Paris St-Germain side are on the verge of history. Phil McNulty explains how they got there.

title: Mardle calls on rivals to step up as 'Lukes' domination continues
description: Sky Sports Darts' Wayne Mardle believes the domination of Luke Humphries and Luke Littler will not slow down any time soon and has called for their rivals to "step up" and challenge them.

title: Liverpool make big-money offer for Wirtz
description: Liverpool have made a £105m offer for Bayer Leverkusen playmaker Florian Wirtz.

title: Dodgers shortstop Mookie Betts is day-to-day after injuring his left toe in mishap
description: Mookie Betts is out of the Los Angeles Dodgers’ lineup against the New York Yankees with an injured left toe.

title: U.S. Women's Open: Amari Avery contending despite playing with borrowed clubs due to boyfriend's mix-up
description: Avery reportedly didn't even have a hat after her boyfriend reportedly took the wrong bag back to Los Angeles.
author: Jack Baer
